about.description: We serve fried chicken tenders baskets and sandwiches.

menu.title: Tenders
menu.description: Pickle-brined white meat tenders fried to a crispy perfection. Each tender basket comes with waffle fries and sauce.

menu.title: Sandwiches
menu.description: All sandwiches served with waffle fries.

items.name: Watson's Hot
items.description: Crunchy chicken tenders dipped in Watson's Hot, served on a brioche bun with creamy coleslaw, dill pickles, & comeback sauce.

items.name: Buffalo Starchild
items.description: Crunchy chicken tenders tossed in buffal sauce, served on a brioche bun with sorghum glazed bacon, black pepper ranch, blue cheese crumbles, & mixed greens.

items.name: Classic Fried
items.description: Crunchy fried chicken tenders with herb mayo, dill pickles, and mixed greens on a brioche bun.

items.name: Classic Grilled
items.description: Grilled chicken tenders with herb mayo, dill pickles, and mixed greens on a brioche bun.

items.name: Watson's Hot Fish
items.description: Fried perch dipped in Watson's hot sauce served on a hoagie roll with creamy coleslaw, dill pickles, and comeback sauce.

items.name: Tofu Po'boy
items.description: Crispy tofu served on a hoagie roll with mixed greens, dill pickles, red onion, and vegan remoulade.

schedule.name: Wright & Green
schedule.location: SW Corner Wright & Green, Champaign, IL

about.description: Delicious pastas, sandwiches, soups salads and lasagnas

menu.title: Pastas
menu.description: Topped with chives, parsely and parmesan cheese. Served with cheese garlic bread

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Delicious alfredo sauce, fettuccine and chicken

items.name: Inferno Pasta
items.description: Penne pasta, spicy cream sauce, sundried tomatoes, chicken and spinach

items.name: Shrimp Pasta
items.description: Fettuccine, alfredo sauce, roasted red peppers, shrimp and mushrooms

items.name: All American Macaroni
items.description: Penne pasta and delicious cheese sauce topped with mix cheese

items.name: Pesto Pasta (veggie)
items.description: Penne noodles, pesto sauce, zucchini, broccoli, carrots

items.name: Three Meat Pasta
items.description: Penne, alfrecio sauce, andouille sausage, chicken, bacon

items.name: Cajun Jambalaya Pasta
items.description: Fettuccine, tomato sauce, andouille sausage, chicken, bacon, red pepper, red onion

items.name: Mexican Pasta
items.description: Fettuccine, creamy sauce, chorizo, onions and cherry tomatoes

schedule.name: Triptych (WINGS!)
schedule.info: Wing Wednesday at Triptych Brewing from 5-8pm! This week, the featured sauce is a Citrus BBQ sauce made with This Is Fine Double IPA.Want more heat? Make it extra hot for a dollar more!
